ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): form = widget.ProviderWidget entity = form.Entity if entity == None: return
widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = entity.Fields["STATUSPROPOSTA"].Value == 1 and entity.Fields["LIBERADOCONFIRMACAO"] == False widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = entity.Fields["STATUSPROPOSTA"].Value == 1 and entity.Fields["LIBERADOCONFIRMACAO"] == False widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = entity.Fields["STATUSPROPOSTA"].Value == 1 and entity.Fields["LIBERADOCONFIRMACAO"] == False
